With this application you can create a server where you can host your own web files.
The tutorial is not intended for end users, but for software developers. Therefore we recommend you to check the documentation before starting.
Folder copying in progress... Please Wait
Select Folder And Starter Html Page
Here you have to choose which folder it should process when the custom server starts and the start page that the custom server should use.
This folder name already copied. Please try different folder or change folder name.
No folders found. Please upload a folder and try again.!
There was a problem copying the folder, please try again.
You cant edit folder and files for now, because custom server is running. Please stop server and try again.

When this option is active, it asks for a 4-digit password when trying to connect to the custom server from any browser. After the user enters this password correctly, user is directed to the selected home page.
No selected file found. Please select file in advanced settings.
Custom Server Port field is empty. Please enter the port value and try again.
The selected custom server %1$d port is currently in use by another application. Please select a different port and try again.
There\'s not much to see at the moment. Planned updates will be made soon.
This app developed by Ozgur Baykal.
